name: Brawl Bay
description:
Brawl Bay is a local multiplayer, top-down 3D Arena Brawler with multiple stages and powerups. 

Game Controls
Keyboard:
Movement - WASD (Player 1) / Arrow Keys (Player 2)
Jump - Space (Player 1) /  Right Control (Player 2)
Punch -  Left Shift (Player 1) / Right Shift (Player 2)

Xbox Controller:
Movement - Left Stick
Jump - A
Punch - B

*Note: All menus are navigated through mouse only, name entry is entered via the keyboard*

Controller is recommended for gameplay.
